original_title: 5kg of ‘Ice’ drugs found concealed inside computer accessories
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Police said that five (05) kilograms of ‘ICE’ drugs (crystal methamphetamine) were seized from a container yard in Katunayaka.
The drug haul was seized during a joint operation by Special Task Force (STF) and Police Narcotics Bureau (PNB) officers.
The consignment of drugs is suspected to have been sent by the drug dealer known as ‘Dubai Nipuna’.
